title: Circa 1900s St Louis Stars Ladies Base Ball Club
author: Leon

posts.post_title: Circa 1900s St Louis Stars Ladies Base Ball Club
posts.post_content:
Circa 1900s St Louis Stars Ladies Base Ball Club

Condition issues ....pinhole at top, some small tears around the edges and creasing as can be seen. Several small pieces of reinforcement tape on back. 
Still a very presentable and scare, early, ladies baseball card. Measures approximately 5 1/2" inches by 7 1/2".  $185 plus shipping/insurance.
